title: What are the pros and cons of technological advancements? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are the pros and cons of technological advancements? Pros: It makes our lives better.Cons: It creates new problems, which then require new solutions.But in reality, it’s not a consequence. It is just how the world advances. Without problems, there are no opportunities.

Things will be easy which makes people lazy, which in turn spoils health which is good for medical profession and drug business. For example, in the days of drawing water from the wells with rope, people do fetch water hard way, which is healthy, and no time to go for jobs. So there were jobs available for people. Now the things are easy and every one wants do job what can be done? Wastage of water is more now than those days.
